data: Platform Number Twenty-one | Liverpool Street Station | April 2
Platform Number Twenty-one | Liverpool Street Station
a quarter to nine on the evening of April 2

There were very few people upon Platform Number Twenty-one of Liverpool Street Station at a quarter to nine on the evening of April 2â€”possibly because the platform in question is one of the most remote and least used in the great terminus.
